nodes.text: This woman was the matriarch of the Datch family, which included Rebel Alliance starfighter pilot Tarrin Datch, his brothers, one sister, and their father. The Datch parents were the proprietors of Pellezara station, in the Duro system.
In 1 ABY, Tarrin joined the Rebel Alliance. Although he missed his family, he knew better than to involve them in the Galactic Civil War.

Unlike Tarrin Datch's father, Datch's mother is never explicitly mentioned in the second edition of Galaxy Guide 3: The Empire Strikes Back. Rather, the phrasing "Tarrin's parents" is used in relation to Tarrin himself and his siblings. This article makes a basic biological assumption for the gender specification of this character.
